item.title: Glass on the road in the junction, 12th June
item.description:
Junction is littered with glass from a shattered bottle. Driving over it is sending shards flying.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Rectory Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Constant fly tipping around our bin, 12th June
item.description:
This rubbish has been here for months now and on top of that there is a pungent smell of dead animal coming from under it. Please remove it and do something to prevent fly tipping here.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The timing of the traffic lights are dangerous, 12th June
item.description:
When a bus (SL3 or B11, for example) are turning right at the traffic light, they take up the whole road. Two cars typically fit behind the bus after crossing the solid white line for the traffic light. However, many times the buses are unable to turn until the light goes red. This causes the two cars that are already past the solid white line to be stuck as the next set of lights for a different side of the road has already gone off, as there isn’t much time for the two cars already in the road to clear the road. Therefore, there should be a larger delay in timing for the traffic lights to switch from red to green on the other side to avoid this issue. This is an issue I happen to see often whenever passing this junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sewage left on path and road, 12th June
item.description:
Sewage was left on the corner of Tylney Road and Canon Road on 12th June. With sewage running down Canon Road along the public path and and roadway. The smell is awful as well as being a hazard to pedestrians near the busy main road. The road and path need to be cleaned as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canon Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
